content.title: Major Depressive Disorder
content.definition: Mood disorder characterized by persistent sadness, anhedonia, and neurovegetative symptoms
key_points: Core concept of Major Depressive Disorder
Essential understanding of Major Depressive Disorder
Clinical/practical relevance of Major Depressive Disorder
clinical_pearls: Important consideration for Major Depressive Disorder
examples: Example application of Major Depressive Disorder
content.statement: Major Depressive Disorder is a fundamental concept in Health-Sciences Medicine Psychiatry that provides essential knowledge for understanding related topics and clinical/practical applications.

explanation.intuition: Understanding Major Depressive Disorder helps build foundational knowledge. The concept connects to broader principles in the field.
explanation.key_insight: The key aspects of Major Depressive Disorder include core principles, common applications, and integration with related concepts.
explanation.technical_details: Technical details involve specific mechanisms, measurements, and evidence-based applications of Major Depressive Disorder.
